metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0127 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The time-validation implementation in (1) mod/feedback/complete.php and (2)mod/feedback/complete_guest.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before2.4.9, 2.5.x before 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to bypass intended restrictions on starting a Feedbackactivity by choosing an unavailable time.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
